product_name: REI Timber Mountain Bib Overalls - Toddler Boys'
long_description: Bundle up your little one in the REI Timber Mountain bib overalls for toddler boys and keep him cozy with a windproof and water-resistant layer while he plays in the snow. Warm fleece lining backs a windproof nylon shell; Durable Water Repellent coating shrugs off snow and light precipitation. Microfleece bib features an elastic waistband and adjustable shoulder straps. Legs feature reinforced and articulated knees, scuff guards and snow gaiters. Zippered, tricot-lined hand pockets; full front zipper.
short_description: Bundle up your little one in the REI Timber Mountain bib overalls for toddler boys and keep him cozy with a windproof and water-resistant layer while he plays in the snow.
subcategory: Skiwear And Snowboard -- Boys And Girls
